metadata.title: CVE-2014-9905 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the Web Calendar inSOGo before 2.2.0 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the (1) title of an appointment or (2) contact fields.

criterions.comment: sogo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
